mapper.select: SELECT /* DeviceModelMapper.searchDeviceChangeModelList, 단말 모델 정보 조회 (운영자 관리), 이태희/부르칸, 2014-03-17 */ COUNT(1) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , MODEL_NM AS DEVICE_MODEL_CD , TRFM_MODEL_NM AS DEVICE_MODEL_NM FROM TB_CM_DEVICE_TRFM

SELECT /* DeviceModelMapper.searchDeviceUserAgentList, 단말 모델 정보 조회 (by UserAgent), 이태희/부르칸, 2014-03-17 */ COUNT(1) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , DEVICE_MODEL_CD , UA_CD FROM TB_CM_DEVICE WHERE REP_DEVICE_YN = 'Y' AND UA_CD IN (SELECT UA_CD FROM TB_CM_DEVICE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND UPPER(#{userAgent}) LIKE '%' || UPPER(DEVICE_MODEL_CD) || '%') AND ROWNUM = 1
